name: Ness Revenge #randomgame
description:
Take control of the mithological Loch Ness monster and take down as many invader ships as you can. They get increasingly faster and may come in fleets, dive to avoid them and reposition!

CONTROLS

  • Hold left mouse button to charge attack and release to shoot
  • Mouse to aim
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Down to dive

This game was inspired by the following icons from #randomicon. Grab a draft and get creative!
